body_html:
@suharshs Once I eliminate merge conflicts and build. The test is not able to recognize SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogits. I get this error in my test in nn_grad_test.cc:
error: use of undeclared identifier 'SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogits' auto y = SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogits(scope_, logits, labels);

The build goes through fine. I don't get any error during the build. I get this error only when I execute
bazel test //tensorflow/cc:gradients_nn_grad_test

Is there anything in the most recent build that has altered the build path or something ? Sorry I have no clue how to resolve this. Even in debug mode I get only this message. I tried multiple iterations of build/test but no luck. Some help please. Thank you.
body:
@suharshs Once I eliminate merge conflicts and build. The test is not able to recognize SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogits. I get this error in my test in nn_grad_test.cc: 
`error: use of undeclared identifier 'SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogits'
auto y = SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogits(scope_, logits, labels);`

The build goes through fine. I don't get any error during the build. I get this error only when I execute 
`bazel test //tensorflow/cc:gradients_nn_grad_test`

Is there anything in the most recent build that has altered the build path or something ? Sorry I have no clue how to resolve this. Even in debug mode I get only this message. I tried multiple iterations of build/test but no luck. Some help please. Thank you.
